page.title: 02 THE VICAR
page.content: We interviewed the vicar of{St Peter's {Church (C.of.E) Askern}and asked him why he liked his job. He said he liked it because it was what God wanted him to be. In a year the vicar had twenty to twenty-five weddings, fifty-five to sixty funerals and eighty christenings. The vicar has not got a favourite day or a busiest but Fridays are the quietest because it is his day off. We asked him to describe to us a typical day in his life and this is what he said. He gets up in the morning, has his breakfast, reads a bit of his bible and says his prayers. He works in his study until it is dinner time. After dinner he goes out and visits people. He then has his tea and takes meetings in the evening.
